name: Proto - Knight Dice
description:
Knight Dice - proto_v0.9Intro

King Arthur is in his quest for the holly grail. As a valourous Knight, thou shall triumph over the enemies to seize the treasures of the castle.

Rules

Three opponents stand in your way.

Each character has a numbers of life points. When an enemy reaches 0 LP, the player faces the next one. When the boss reaches 0 LP, the player ends the game.

The damages are calculated according to the difference between the result of each die.

GUARD removes 1 damage as well. By default, characters start with zero Guards.

Guarding affects the characters dice range (for the next attack only):

  • 0 Guard: range between 0 and 3,
  • 1 Guard: range between 1 and 3,
  • 2 Guards: range between 1 and 6,
  • 3 Guards: range between 3 and 6.
